message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.AI, cs.CR 

The paper deals with person re-identification using deep learning techniques, which falls under the computer vision (cs.CV) sub-category. The paper also proposes a novel CNN architecture for joint learning of local and global features, which involves optimization of multiple losses, indicating a focus on machine learning (cs.LG) and multimedia (cs.MM) sub-categories. Additionally, the paper involves the use of generic matching metrics such as L2 distance, indicating a possible focus on artificial intelligence (cs.AI) sub-category. Finally, the paper also involves evaluation of the proposed method against state-of-the-art methods, indicating a possible focus on cryptography and security (cs.CR) sub-category.
